author: Thidawan Tunya
title: Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul At The Bosphorus Named Turkey’s Best Employer 2014
text:
Email 
Four Seasons Hotel Istanbull at the Bosphorus has been recognised at Turkey’s Best Employer 2014 among 82 companies that participated in Aon Hewitt’s 2014 Best Employers Study. 
Four Seasons Hotel Bosphorus also earned third place in the Best Employers in Midsize Companies in Central and Eastern Europe Region category among 127 companies. The results are based on the independent opinions of the employees. 
Results of the Best Employers Study, which has been organised in Turkey for nine years, were announced in a ceremony held on June 10, 2015 at the Hotel with the participation of employees and the management team. 
“We’re honoured that Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at the Bosphorus has been recognised as the Best Employer in Turkey,” says Leonardo Baiocchi , General Manager of the Hotel. “We are in the job of creating long lasting memories based on memorable experiences and personalised service, and we know we can only achieve it with the dedication and daily passion of each team member. Therefore we strive to create a unique work environment for them.” 
The companies obtaining better outcomes from their works and making them sustainable get the edge on the issues such as leadership, prestige and performance culture, as well as having better employee engagement. Accordingly, they earn points on the survey for the indexes such as Engaged Leaders, High Performance Culture, Strong Employer Brand and Sustainability. With an outstanding success in satisfying all those conditions,Four Seasons Hotel Istanbul at the Bosphorus earned the top spot in the study.
